results.text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
results.reason: God is the ultimate source of strength for believers.
results.reflection: In times of trouble, find refuge and strength in God.

results.text: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
results.reason: God provides strength to those who are tired and weak.
results.reflection: When we are weary, God renews our strength.

results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: Through Christ, believers can find strength to overcome challenges.
results.reflection: With Christ's strength, we can face any situation.

results.text: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christâ€™s power may rest on me.
results.reason: God's power is manifested in our weakness, providing strength.
results.reflection: In our weaknesses, God's strength is revealed.

results.text: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.
results.reason: Believers are encouraged to find strength in the Lord's power.
results.reflection: Our strength comes from relying on the Lord's mighty power.
